name: Lost Siblings
description:
A very simple yet short game depicting the two siblings connected together.

Two siblings lost in an unknown world. An unknown world filled with dangers and puzzles. Why are these two siblings in this world?

Play as the two siblings simultaneously connected by a link. Complete puzzles and collect coins. All the meanwhile staying connected to each other.

Consists of 4 stages only thus far.

Controls:

WASD - Character Movement

Arrow keys - Character Movement

Esc - Pause Button

All arts and designs are original creation

Sounds are taken and edited from freesound.org

Music:

Back Beat Candy 08-12 - Space [https://soundcloud.com/backbeat-candy/space]

Sherar - Abyss [https://soundcloud.com/sherarsound/sherar-abyss-game-project]

Niri - Space [https://soundcloud.com/niribeats/space]

For the best experience/fullscreen mode. You can download the game below
